Module org.example.proyecto
Package org.example.proyecto.model.user

Interface UserDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserDB
public interface UserDAO
The UserDAO interface provides methods for interacting with user data in the database.
Since:
2024-05-28
Author:
Omar

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    deleteUser(UserDTO deletedUser)
    Deletes a user from the database.
    List<UserDTO>
    getUsers()
    Retrieves a list of all users from the database.
    boolean
    insertUser(UserDTO newUser)
    Inserts a new user into the database.
    boolean
    updateUser(UserDTO updatedUser)
    Updates user information in the database.
    UserDTO
    userLogin(String userEmail, String userPasswd)
    Performs user login authentication by verifying the provided email and password against the database.

  • Method Details

    • getUsers

      List<UserDTO> getUsers() throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of all users from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of UserDTO objects representing the users retrieved from the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while accessing the database.

    • userLogin

      UserDTO userLogin(String userEmail, String userPasswd) throws SQLException
      Performs user login authentication by verifying the provided email and password against the database.
      Parameters:
      userEmail - The email address of the user trying to log in.
      userPasswd - The password of the user trying to log in.
      Returns:
      A UserDTO object representing the authenticated user if login is successful, or null if authentication fails.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while accessing the database.

    • insertUser

      boolean insertUser(UserDTO newUser) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new user into the database.
      Parameters:
      newUser - A UserDTO object representing the user to be inserted.
      Returns:
      true if the user is successfully inserted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while accessing the database.

    • deleteUser

      boolean deleteUser(UserDTO deletedUser) throws SQLException
      Deletes a user from the database.
      Parameters:
      deletedUser - A UserDTO object representing the user to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the user is successfully deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while accessing the database.

    • updateUser

      boolean updateUser(UserDTO updatedUser) throws SQLException
      Updates user information in the database.
      Parameters:
      updatedUser - A UserDTO object representing the updated user information.
      Returns:
      true if the user information is successfully updated, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while accessing the database.
